Overview of Accreditation
Overview of Accreditation

Accreditation is a status that provides public notification that an institution, agency, or program meets standards of quality set forth by an accrediting agency.
Accreditation is a status that provides public notification that an institution,
agency, or program meets standards of quality set forth by an accrediting a g e n c y ,

Public Health Accreditation
Public Health Accreditation

Goal: to improve and protect the health of every community by advancing the quality and performance of public health departments (state, local, Tribal, territorial).
